summary.span: 加入 之事件的處理常式。

span.span: Adds a handler for an event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在建立委派 (Delegate) 時，您要識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除委派，否則每次發生事件時都會呼叫事件處理常式。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 可加入多個委派以處理事件。Multiple delegates can be added to handle an event. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 使用以下程式碼可加入與移除處理常式。Handlers are added and removed using the following code. 此程式碼範例是傳送電子郵件 SDK > 範例的一部分，並是 SendMailActivity.cs 檔案中。This code example is part of the Send Email SDK sample and is from the SendMailActivity.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 傳送電子郵件活動範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669)。For more information, see [Send Email Activity Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bfb5939e-60a9-4037-af4e-2cea9e654669). remarks.format: ## Remarks 會直接將值設定為 。 sets the value directly to the . 同樣的， 將處理常式直接加入型別事件的屬性。Similarly, adds a handler directly to properties of type event. 這些方法在呼叫相同屬性時是互斥的。These methods are exclusive when they are called for the same property. 如果呼叫 ，則先前使用 (在事件中的 ) 設定的值會被忽略。If is called, then the values previously set using ( in events) are disregarded. 反之亦相同： () 會重設使用 指派的繫結。The same is true the other way around: () resets the binding assigned with . ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何建立活動，然後將活動加入至複合活動做為子系，並且包含為這個型別設定 權限。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and includes setting the permission for this type. 此外，說明 方法的使用。In addition, the use of the method is illustrated. 這個程式碼範例是 ThrowWorkflow.cs 檔案中＜擲回 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 使用擲回](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。For more information, see [Using Throw](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event Disposed As EventHandler Implements System.ComponentModel.IComponent

summary.span: 表示處理元件 Disposed 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the Disposed event of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立已處置的委派時，您會識別處理事件的方法。When you create a Disposed delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserData As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ UserData { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，它會將自訂資料與這個類別執行個體產生關聯。

span.span: Gets an that associates custom data with this class instance.

value.span: 字典，做為開發人員的擴充攔截，以操作設計工具的 宣告，並將自訂資料與個別活動宣告產生關聯。

span.span: A dictionary that acts as an extensibility hook for developers to manipulate declarations for a design tool and associate custom data with individual activity declarations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是`metaproperty`，這表示它是在執行階段不變。This property is a `metaproperty`, which means it is immutable at run time. `Metaproperties` 不會變更的屬性執行個體建立在執行階段，因此屬性必須設定為常值，在設計階段之後。`Metaproperties` do not change after a property instance is created at run time, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time. 這個屬性未用於由 Windows Workflow Foundation 提供的預設 宣告實作。This property is not used in the default declaration implementations provided by Windows Workflow Foundation. 這個集合未序列化。該集合所包含的資料不會從設計階段保存到執行階段。This collection is not serialized; data that the collection contains is not persisted from design time to run time.
